Class TextualizeAreaTextMask

  • java.lang.Object
    • onbon.y2.play.TextualizeAreaTextMask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TextualizeArea.Mask

    public class TextualizeAreaTextMask
extends java.lang.Object
implements TextualizeArea.Mask
    The mask uses text to create mask images.

    ONBON
